attributes.action: withdraw the plans for the proposed Furness Academy from opening in September 2009.
attributes.action_prefix: We the undersigned petition the Prime Minister to
attributes.background:
We strongly feel the Furness Academy will be detremental to the education of our children and future children in Barrow in Furness and is NOT the way forward.  

We already have three very good schools that perform well and have their own merits. Each school has it's own unique community that has been built up over many years.  

The pupils protested on Monday 1st June at Parkview School to demonstrate their strong feelings against loosing their three schools and the loss of many excellent teachers.  

We do not want the Academy and without the co-operation of the pupils and parents it will not work.

reasons: Duplicate - this is similar to and/or overlaps with an existing petition or petitions
